Text:
Thanks for the upload...but...

What's with all the fucking rar's?!!!

I mean, Fuck shit man! Am I supposed to keep one copy for watching AND hold on to ANOTHER spanned volume copy just to fucking seed?

Sure, why not? I mean, after all, my disk space is FUCKING INFINITE after all...isn't it? What?! It's not?! Really?!! Well, then...fuck me! 

I MIGHT not be seeding after I grab this...just an FYI.
The scene releases are RAR so that if part of the file becomes corrupt you dont have to re-download the whole file just the rar file that was bad
